attributes.action: Furlough Leave to include Salespeople’s Regular Commissions within 80% payment.
attributes.additional_details: Myself and many other sales people rely on the regular monthly commission we earn to pay our bills and support our families.  This is not currently being included in furlough leave and as such a large number of people are not going to be able to pay bills, mortgages or feed their families.
attributes.background: Furlough Leave needs to include Salespeople’s regular Commissions within 80% payment not just basic salaries.
